about_the_game:
Fight, scavenge, craft and survive against relentless zombies and dangerous players

The Midnight Walkers is a hardcore PvPvE first-person zombie survival extraction shooter.
Survivors must explore the mega Liberty Grand Center, scavenging for gear while fending off relentless hordes of zombies.
Craft weapons, armor, and consumables, or trade items with other players through the dark web-based marketplace to secure even stronger equipment.

The game can be played in solo or trios mode, while you explore various floors such as shopping malls, hospitals, and casinos—each with its own challenges.
Plan your survival and escape routes carefully.

Successfully escaping will allow you to store the gear and items you’ve secured in your personal stash or use them in your next run.
However, if you fall to zombies, rival survivors, or the deadly poison gas, you’ll lose everything.

Explore a mega-complex overrun by extremely dangerous zombies

Liberty Grand Center mega-complex is overrun by dangerous zombies, mutated variants, deadly bosses, and desperate survivors using any means necessary to scavenge for the same loot as you. Utilize elevators to explore shopping mall, hospital, and casino floors, and plan escape route from dangers, including the countdown-triggered poison gas system.

While the gas spreads across random floors every few minutes, survivors must stay alert and move swiftly.
Continuous exposure to this fatal gas dramatically reduces survival chances to 0. Put your combat survival skills to the test see how long you can last in the unforgiving and lethal Liberty Grand Center.

Gear up with your custom slayer's arsenal

Arm yourself with a diverse range of melee weapons and firearms. The Dagger and Katana deliver rapid strikes, much like the revolver. For hard hitting power, the Sledgehammer and break-action single-barrel Shotgun deliver devastating results. The bow and bolt-action rifle offer long-range precision, rewarding skilled shots with deadly takedowns. Strategically wield them to outmatch both the zombies and rival survivors.

Encounter deadly zombies, mutated variants, and lethal bosses

The zombies in Liberty Grand Center are deadly, with their threat escalating as their numbers grow. Slow-moving Walkers and Crawlers are easy to avoid but can quickly overwhelm if you’re not careful. Runners, on the other hand, are quick to ambush inattentive survivors, easily attracted to noise and adding to the chaos.

Mutated zombie variants are powerful threats with dangerous abilities that demand immediate attention. Acid-spitters force survivors to stay mobile, pushing them to close the gap to engage. Smashers, with their massive health, slam the ground to create AOE shockwaves. Meanwhile, Rammers rush toward survivors like a battering ram, aiming to scatter the group and cause chaos.

Each enemy demands a unique approach, and taking on multiple zombies at once requires both strategy and skill- especially if, against all odds, you find yourself facing them all at once. Surviving means knowing when to fight, or when to run.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (22H2 Latest Version)
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X(TBD)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580 (TBD)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X (TBD)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600XT (TBD)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Fight, loot, and survive in a PvPvE FPS extraction shooter set in Liberty Grand Center, a towering mega-complex overrun by deadly zombies and brutal bosses. Craft weapons, search for loot, or steal from other survivors. Escape with your life-or descend deeper and discover its horrors.

English*, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
